baby_jane.description: Milo decided it was time for Baby Jane to get a scrubbin'.
baby_jane.title: Baby Jane

brunch1.description:
Sunday brunch with some New School families. Halloween is in the air! Owen (astronaut), Hannah (superwoman), Leo (superman).

Lucie sewed the costumes that Felix and Milo are wearing. We are going to be The Incredibles, a movie superhero family. Felix is Dash, Milo is Jack Jack, Lucie is Elastigirl and Dean is Mr. Incredible.
brunch1.title: Brunch 1

brunch2.description: Quite a while back, Felix had this idea for a dessert: yogurt, honey and milk.  Lucie finally let him make it for the brunch, and it was pretty tasty!  Felix made it and served it.  He was a bit disappointed that Owen didn't even try any, but Dean ate it all up.
brunch2.title: Brunch 2

brunch3.description: Hannah used to go to New School, but is now in Kindergarden at Washington School. Felix might be going there.  We've already starting visiting schools.
brunch3.title: Brunch 3

brunch4.description: Ada, Owen's little sister, is two months old.
brunch4.title: Brunch 4

brunch5.description: Leo is cute and likes to play with balls as much as Milo.
brunch5.title: Brunch 5

woodshop.description: Yohanna, at the New School's woodshop class. You can see Felix in the back with David. Most kids just bang nails, but Felix always has a plan of exactly what he wants to build, and searches through the piles of wood until he finds exactly the right pieces to make it.
woodshop.title: Woodshop

description:
Milo started the "Why?" phase as if it had been launched from a cannon. It happened on a specific minute. Friday. Three in the morning. He had been crying because of teething so was in our bed, which happens only once every few months.

Milo: [Sing-songing. I think it was Twinkle Twinkle Little Star.]

Dean: Milo, go to sleep.

Milo: Why?

Dean: Because it's nighttime.

Milo: Why?

Dean: Because it's dark.

Milo: Why?

Dean: Because the side of the Earth with Berkeley on it has rotated away from the sun.

Milo: Why?

Dean: [Doesn't answer; Milo can't really be interested?]

Milo: Why Papa?

Dean: [Prentending to sleep....]

Milo: WHY ROTATE, PAPA?

Dean: Because when the solar system formed, everything was spinning as it solidified. Without the rotation you wouldn't exist, Milo.

Milo: Why?

Dean: MILO! GO TO SLEEP!

Milo: Why?

He hasn't stopped asking "Why?" since.

Both boys passed their dental exams with flying colors. It was Milo's first and he wouldn't have done it except for Felix's sterling example. And it was a relief that Felix had no cavities because last time he had several. The flossing's such a pain, but paying off. Felix nearly broke down before the appointment when he learned that even WITH the flossing there was a chance the dentist would find cavities: that wasn't part of the deal!

Sometimes Lucie forgets how to say something in French. Same with Alfonso, a Hispanic teacher at New School. Felix is fascinated by that, and asked Lucie: "Does Papa still remember how to speak Baton Rouge?" He seemed to be surprised that Dean spoke English his entire life. Also during this conversation, Lucie realized Felix didn't know that Lucie speaks French to him. Felix was astounded:

Felix: But I don't speak French!

Lucie: [In French] You understand French. I bet you could speak it if you try.

Felix: How do you say "Would you like to play with me?"

Lucie: Est-ce que tu veux jouer avec moi?

Felix: Would you jouer avec me?

Anyway, Lucie's happy that he's at least starting to consider speaking French.
title: October 15
